Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be far beyond $15000 to many potential users. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive introductory price of $20000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
